resources.string: NFC HCE NDEF REAL NFC AID
Emulate NFC Forum Type-4 tag with a NDEF message.\nTo read the message you need a separate reader app running on a second device.
This example emulates a type-4 tag with an NDEF record (RTD_TEXT). It uses an aid-filter D2760000850101 for the APDU SELECT command.
